mapper.sql: id, c_name, c_room_id, c_room_name, c_desc, c_teacher, c_start_time, c_end_time, c_people, c_status, c_word_size, update_time, c_remark
mapper.select:
select
from tb_course where c_status = 0 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from tb_course where c_status = 0 and c_end_time > #{time}

select cs.id, cs.c_name, cs.c_room_id, cs.c_room_name, cs.c_desc, cs.c_teacher, cs.c_start_time, cs.c_end_time, cs.c_people, cs.c_status, cs.c_word_size, cs.update_time, cs.c_remark from tb_course cs where cs.c_status = 0 and cs.c_end_time > #{currentDateTime} and cs.id in ( select se.course_id from tb_seat se where se.card_no = #{card_number} ) order by cs.c_start_time limit 1

select
from tb_course where c_status = 0
and CONCAT(IFNULL(`c_name`,'')) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%')

select
from tb_course where c_room_id = #{roomId} order by update_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into tb_course (id, c_name, c_room_id, c_desc, c_teacher, c_start_time, c_end_time, c_people, update_time, c_remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_course
id,
c_name,
c_room_id,
c_room_name,
c_desc,
c_teacher,
c_start_time,
c_end_time,
c_people,
c_status,
c_word_size,
update_time,
c_remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{cEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{cPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cWordSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tb_course
c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_room_id = #{cRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_room_name = #{cRoomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_desc = #{cDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_teacher = #{cTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_start_time = #{cStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_end_time = #{cEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_people = #{cPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_status = #{cStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_word_size = #{cWordSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_remark = #{cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_course set c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_room_id = #{cRoomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_desc = #{cDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_teacher = #{cTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_start_time = #{cStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_end_time = #{cEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_people = #{cPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_remark = #{cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
